title: Scientific Inquiry and Critical Thinking Enhancement Project Based on Chemistry Board Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemical concepts (atoms, molecules, chemical bonding, etc.) and ability to conduct simple experiments and interpret data
context.additional_context: Learners participate in chemistry board games (virtual experiments, molecular assembly, etc.) using VR devices and smart devices, with feedback via LMS on experimental result analysis and scientific conclusion processes.

learning_goals: Solving chemical reaction mechanisms and molecular structure problems with over 85% accuracy through game missions (experiment design, variable control, etc.).
Presenting hypothesis setting and evidence-based reasoning during in-game decision-making to improve scientific critical thinking indicators in over 70% of learners.

Replicating the structural properties and reactivity of alkane derivatives through game content (molecular modeling, experiment simulation) to double learner engagement compared to traditional methods.

resources: Android-Based VR Chemistry Board Game (Al Chemist Knight)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
